page.title: 09Houghton-Children's games
page.content: FRENCH TIGGY is a game played by 5 or more players.They all stand in a line & chant the verse"French tiggy,french tiggy 1 2 3,if you show your teeth or smile you're man 1 2 3."In turn they make a humming noise & cover their teeth with their lips.The person who makes their teeth visible is "man". This person tries to tig someone else. If someone is caught they must hold hands & together catch the rest.If 4 people are caught then they split in to 2 groups.When everybody is caught then the game is repeated .In BRITISH BULLDOG you have a person standing in the middle.He picks a person & tries to catch them.If he gets across them the rest run as well.If he doesn't then he helps to catch the others.The last one across is the winner.Other games include Tiggy Scarecrow & Kings
